timeline.bodyText: A simpler test case could just directly create a SuppressTrait rather than needing to use a TraitFactory. Seems like the TraitFactory bit isn't under test here.
timeline.author: mtdowling

timeline.bodyText: Then here you could test both for the concrete trait class, no? (i.e., shape.getTrait(SuppressTrait.class))
timeline.author: mtdowling

timeline.bodyText: Nit, personal taste -- I know this comes right after some forEach calls, but I prefer a normal for loop when possible.
timeline.author: mtdowling
